attributes.action: Make a law that prevents preferential treatment in the workplace
attributes.additional_details: Put a law in place that would give all employees including them on work probation a chance to claim unfair dismissal if they have been treated unfairly compared to a colleague on grounds of preferential treatment
attributes.background: Make a law that prevents any employee from the day they start been treated in an unfair way compared to a colleague due to favouritism currently discrimination only counts if its characterised I want a law to prevent any form of preferential treatment in the workplace been allowed

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what you'd like covered by 'preferential treatment' and how this would work. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
